website_summaries.verdict: All-in-all, people are happy with the Nike Renew Run and what it has to offer. This neutral running shoe offers lightweight construction, sturdy materials, a breathable upper unit, and a well-balanced midsole. Daily runners can expect a supportive and secure platform that also provides comfort in each move.Fans of road running shoes are the target market of the Nike Renew Run.
pros: The general durability of the materials used for the Nike Renew Run is welcomed by most consumers
Several consumers have claimed that the overall weight of this running shoe is light
People are happy that the looks can transition between active and fashion-focused lifestyles
The toe box is praised for permitting the toes to splay naturally during the run
According to some testers, the upper unit of this Nike running shoe is breathable enough for all-day wear
The heel part of the cushioned platform is welcomed for having a moderately dense balance-point
cons: Some users say the fabric underneath the tongue unit tends to rub uncomfortably against the skin
A few testers report that the in-shoe experience is a bit restrictive

customer_reviews.title: Superior shoe great price point.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great for runners that need stability, and neutral runners can benefit too. With the new foam is is comfy and supportive. Not too soft. Great fit. Suggest going a half to full size. Can be used as a daily trainer or a recovery run. Great price point. You get a lot of shoe for a $70.00 price point. Slowly Nike is coming back. Check online for prices. I got mine though Lonestar trade. I am in NY got the in 3 days. Give them a try. Happy trails!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes/Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable for running/cross training. I usually wear a 10 in Nike, but these are tapered toward the toe, so a 10 was too small. I'm exchanging it for a 10.5 and they'll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A super comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great running shoe with very good support. Nike shoes often have different structures which tend to bother my feet. Often the arch support is either too narrow and makes your foot feel jammed into the shoe, or it offers too much support and ends up making your feet hurt something fierce. This particular shoe has great support and cushion for the constant jarring of jogging/running
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Maier

customer_reviews.title: The best Nike running shoe I ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve paid more than double for running shoes but these Nikes are so far my favorite. Next to my NB Fresh Foam 1080 V8. I highly recommend them! I will get another pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I tried them the first time I went running for 45 minutes this morning . Very comfy compared to my other nike running shoes I have. Love them
customer_reviews.author: El A.

customer_reviews.title: Petfect running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my son and he is happy with ir. It did fit petfectly and is very confortable for running.
customer_reviews.author: Hilde Colina

customer_reviews.title: It's a good quality and worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The price is good compared to nike.com and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: khalid

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered these! They fit great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bullock

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Great job, very good at all means I am happy with the purchase keep up the good work to all employees
customer_reviews.author: samuel vargas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support and cushioning......I bought another pair as a replacement if I could not find the same pair in 6mos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, except for the blisters
customer_reviews.text: You will 100% get blisters if you run without any cushions or wraps. I would go to CVS and get blister cushions before running in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: John ehring

customer_reviews.title: They run a little small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were great. My only drawback is they were tight on the toes, I've returned the size 12 for a 13 and waiting for them to come in the mail. Overall a good pair of shoes for running.
customer_reviews.author: roy evans

customer_reviews.title: Busted  boxes
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in the most busted ass box I’ve ever seen. The shoes seem new but I’m left to wonder
customer_reviews.author: Ian Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use these for walking and they are close to perfect. Lightweight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Storr

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, almost fit well
customer_reviews.text: They are “puffy” like an overstuffed chair, especially in the tongue. I imagine they will break in with time. Aesthetically they are sharp looking except for the heel that extends a bit far making them look like prescription orthopedic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are trash.
customer_reviews.text: I deviated from the $100+ Nike vomero shoes I prefer just to see what a cheaper shoe was like. It was trash. My ankle was pouring blood after one 5 mile run. I immediately returned these. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Friar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable shoe and it perfect for every day use and love to run on them, you won’t be disappointed with this purchase 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Joel Niño

customer_reviews.title: like running on air
customer_reviews.text: they have alot of padding and when running on hard surfaces I can feel the hard ground and impact much less. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: J.brooks

customer_reviews.title: Best DEAL Going.
customer_reviews.text: I was hooked after the first pair. Now I own 15 colors. And wont hesitate to get the last 3. On avg I have purchased these at $55 or under. A total STEAL. Very comfortable. And size is right on (sz 14) So many shoes are going away from a tongue to a 1 piece upper. These have a tongue that is padded. Great cushion all over. Cant recommend these enough. If you have the money $90 is reasonable. But look for the deals. They are out there.
customer_reviews.author: JMcd

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: One major flaw for me on these shoes. The heel goes really high and wasn’t very forgiving. After walking about a mile I couldn’t go any further. As you can see in the picture the shoes rubbed my heels raw even though I was wearing a pair of quality mid calf athletic socks. I don’t recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nike shoes are the best.
customer_reviews.text: Walk every day and they are very comfortable. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo Lopez

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Renew Run Track Shoe
